articles.content: After the spike in COVID-19 cases reported in Multnomah County this weekend, public health officials today offered a few explanations of the rising numbers, including that the majority of cases in th… [+2071 chars]

articles.author: Dennis Romboy
articles.title: What’s driving the surge of COVID-19 cases in Utah? - Deseret News
articles.description: Utahns have enjoyed going shopping, eating out again and worshiping together again. Many have returned to the office after months of working at home. Thousands have gathered for concerts or youth sporting events. But social interaction is coming at a price.
